amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298. Operative date January 1, 2016. Preincorporation transactions; joint and several liability.
amendatorysection.para: All persons purporting to act as or on behalf of a corporation, knowing there was no incorporation under the Business Corporation Act, shall be jointly and severally liable for all liabilities created while so acting.

annotation.para: This section is not applicable when an individual contracts as an agent of a corporation that was in existence when the contract was executed. Par 3, Inc. v. Livingston, 268 Neb. 636, 686 N.W.2d 369 (2004).
